channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-22593] SavepointITCase.testShouldAddEntropyToSavepointPath unstable

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I have a build where this failure not only occurred for testShouldAddEntropyToSavepointPath
but also testTriggerSavepointAndResumeWithFileBasedCheckpointsAndRelocateBasePath
